dimensions.name: Root Cause Accuracy
dimensions.explanation: The agent correctly identified the root causes related to MMDVFS and CM/PowerHal/DDR voting.

dimensions.name: Causal Chain Completeness
dimensions.explanation: The causal chain is mostly captured but lacks explicit mention of SW_REQ2/SW_REQ3 voting mechanisms.

dimensions.name: Metric Precision
dimensions.explanation: Most metrics are correctly identified, but some specific CPU frequencies are missing.

dimensions.name: Reasoning Quality
dimensions.explanation: The reasoning is logical and correctly identifies MMDVFS as a cause.

dimensions.name: Actionability
dimensions.explanation: No historical fixes or recommendations are provided, limiting actionability.
